alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; Morongo Basin; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 22 at 1:57AM PST until December 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, including the following area, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and southeast California, including the following areas, Cadiz Basin, Morongo Basin and San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rainfall is expected tonight through Friday night. Moderate rainfall rates can be expected at times, with total amounts between 0.75" to 1.50" in the Watch area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; Morongo Basin; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
